00036 /*! The identifier to identify a quantification CHP file. */
00037 #define CHP_QUANTIFICATION_TYPE "affymetrix-quantification-analysis"
00038 
00039 /*! Holds data associated with quantification CHP files. */
00040 class CHPQuantificationData
00041 {

00049         CHPQuantificationData(const std::string& filename);

00065         int maxProbeSetName;

00089         void SetArrayType(const std::wstring& value);

00092          * @param ln The number of probe sets.
00093          * @param maxln The maximum length of a probe set name.
00094          */
00095         void SetEntryCount(int32_t ln, int32_t maxln);
00096

00098          * @param ln The number of probe sets.
00099          */
